name: Hooper
description:
A lot of sweat, tears and pancakes later, Hooper has become a reality.This cute, money hungry bunny whacks his opponents with his hula hoop, as long as it spins fast enough!

Move Hooper with the mouse to make the hoop spin!

Can you get to the chest before you run out of carrots?

We figured that a lot of people would go for a repeating level concept or doing the same thing over and over again, so we figured we'd take a more... Objective look at "Stuck in a loop". A hula hoop is a loop, no?

Mr-Greenhat - Programming

DevilDanger - Programming

Aiko - Programming

Liess - Designer and Artist

WegmanJunior - Music and SFX

If you can, please rate our game for Ludum Dare 47! For many of us, this was a first time, and we had a lot of fun.
